body_html:
As we moved our support to cuda 8.0, the support for 7.5 is best effort.
I cannot promise we will get to this in a timely manner, so I am marking this contributions welcome.
I am happy to accept a PR to fix this on CUDA 7.5 and also does not break CUDA 8.0

body:
As we moved our support to cuda 8.0, the support for 7.5 is best effort.
I cannot promise we will get to this in a timely manner, so I am marking this contributions welcome.
I am happy to accept a PR to fix this on CUDA 7.5 and also does not break CUDA 8.0
